feature.label: TI-RTOS for SimpleLink Wireless MCUs (Target Content)
feature.description: This version of TI-RTOS for SimpleLink Wireless MCUs Target Content can be chosen separately for each C/C++ project via their project settings. The TI-RTOS for SimpleLink Wireless MCUs IDE Client, on the other hand, is common to all projects and its version must be equal to or greater than the version of this Target Content feature.
feature.license: Released under Eclipse public license(EPL). Visit http://www.eclipse.org/legal/epl-v10.html for details of license.
